name: zmodcld
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, cmo, c1), cn0), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, (c0[mod]c1)∈ ℕ0, c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℕ)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cmo, c1), cn0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn)), wcel(co(c0, cmo, c1), cn0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cmo, c1), cn0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn)), wcel(co(c0, cmo, c1), cn0))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cn)), wcel(co(c0, cmo, c1), cn0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cmo, c1), cn0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn))

comment: Closure law for the modulo operation restricted to integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
